root.name: Agatha Christie: Evil Under the Sun
root.description: Evil Under the Sun is loosely based on the famous novels of Agatha Christie. While on vacation on Seadrift Island, detective Hercule Poirot's relaxation is cut short when the body of Arlene Stuart, the actress, floats up on shore.Â Anyone on the island could be a suspect, so Hercule Poirot's leisure time ends and it's time to go back to work solving this murder.
